attributes.action: Create another UK bank holiday on Feb 29th
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In leap years, salaried workers get paid the same as in non-leap years but have to work an extra day.  If the day was a holiday it wouldn't cost the economy much as it'd only be 1 day every four years (minus the 2 days per 28 years the 29th is on a weekend)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
